en: State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国国务委员会直属机关，负责体育事务的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body for sports affairs, directly under the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国国务委员会

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国国务委员会
en: State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的最高国家领导机关。
description.en: The supreme national leadership body of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国内阁

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国内阁
en: Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的最高国家行政执行机关。
description.en: The supreme state administrative and executive body of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

en: Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 国家体育指导委员会的前身之一，曾隶属于朝鲜内阁。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, formerly under the Cabinet of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，现任朝鲜内阁总理与国家体育指导委员会委员长。
description.en: North Korean politician, currently serving as the Premier of the Cabinet and Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜前高层领导人，曾任国家体育指导委员会首任委员长。
description.en: Former high-ranking North Korean leader, served as the first Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，曾任国家体育指导委员会委员长。
description.en: North Korean politician, formerly served as Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，曾任国家体育指导委员会委员长。
description.en: North Korean politician, formerly served as Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜体育事务机构的前身，是一个民间组织体系。
description.en: Predecessor of North Korea's sports affairs body, established as a civil organization system.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜体育事务机构的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of North Korea's sports affairs body.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜体育事务机构的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of North Korea's sports affairs body.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜体育事务机构的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of North Korea's sports affairs body.

relationships.target: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国国务委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家体育指导委员会是朝鲜民主主义人民共和国国务委员会的直属机关。
description.en: The State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission is an organ directly under the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 张成泽于2012年12月至2013年担任国家体育指导委员会委员长。
description.en: Jang Song-thaek served as the Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission from December 2012 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 崔龙海于2013年至2017年担任国家体育指导委员会委员长。
description.en: Choe Ryong-hae served as the Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission from 2013 to 2017.

description.zh-cn: 崔辉于2017年至2023年2月担任国家体育指导委员会委员长。
description.en: Choe Hwi served as the Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission from 2017 to February 2023.

description.zh-cn: 金德训自2023年2月起担任国家体育指导委员会委员长。
description.en: Kim Tok-hun has been serving as the Chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission since February 2023.

relationships.target: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国内阁

description.zh-cn: 金德训兼任朝鲜民主主义人民共和国内阁总理。
description.en: Kim Tok-hun concurrently serves as the Premier of the Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 国家体育指导委员会于2012年自内阁所属的体育省独立并扩大设立。
description.en: In 2012, the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission was established independently and expanded from the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, which was under the Cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 1954年6月，北朝鲜体育同盟更名为内阁直属的朝鲜体育指导委员会。
description.en: In June 1954, the North Korea Sports Federation was renamed the Korea Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Committee, directly under the Cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 1989年6月，朝鲜体育指导委员会更名为朝鲜国家体育委员会。
description.en: In June 1989, the Korea Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Committee was renamed the State Physical Culture and Sports Commission of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月，朝鲜国家体育委员会更名为体育省。
description.en: In September 1998, the State Physical Culture and Sports Commission of Korea was renamed the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports.

description.zh-cn: 1999年11月，体育省更名为体育指导委员会。
description.en: In November 1999, the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports was renamed the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2012年11月，在体育指导委员会的基础上，重新成立了作为国务委员会直属机关的国家体育指导委员会。
description.en: In November 2012, based on the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Committee, the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission was re-established as an organ directly under the State Affairs Commission.

relationships.target: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国内阁

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜体育指导委员会在1954年至1969年以及1986年至1989年期间隶属于内阁。
description.en: The Korea Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Committee was subordinate to the Cabinet from 1954 to 1969 and from 1986 to 1989.
